title: Minkey
creator_credit: Peter Goodall and Western Australia Institute of Technology
brief_description: A promotional video for the sport of “Minkey”, a modified form of hockey and part of the Aussie Sports program. Minkey can be played by combined teams of boys and girls on any flat surface and involves a number of individual and team skills.
